html:
Accounts Payable Invoice

Customer Name: {{ doc.customer or '' }} Invoice No.: {{ doc.name or '' }}
Payment Due Date: {{ frappe.format_date(doc.due_date) }} Prepared Date: {{ frappe.format_date(doc.posting_date) }}
Purchase Order: {{ doc.po_no or '' }} Purchase Order Date: {{ frappe.format_date(doc.po_date) or '' }}
TIN No.: {{ doc.tin or '' }}
Shipping Address: {{ doc.shipping_address }} Bill Date Received: {{ frappe.format_date(doc.bill_date_received) }}
{% for item in doc.items %} {% if item.is_free_item %} {% else %} {% endif %} {% endfor %}
ITEM NO. DESCRIPTION UOM QTY UNIT PRICE DISCOUNT TOTAL AMOUNT
{{ item.item_code or None }} {{ item.item_name or 'undefined' }} {{ item.stock_uom or 'undefined' }} {{ item.qty }} {{ "₱ {:,.2f}".format(item.rate or 1.0) }}{{ 'FREE' }} {{ '₱ 0.00' }}{{ "₱ {:,.2f}".format(item.discount_amount or 0.0) }} {{ "₱ {:,.2f}".format(item.rate * item.qty) }}
******* Nothing Follows *******
TOTAL QTY {{ doc.total_qty }}
SUBTOTAL {{ "₱ {:,.2f}".format(doc.total) }}
{% for tax in doc.taxes %} {% endfor %}
Output VAT: {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(tax.tax_amount,currency=doc.currency) }}
GRAND TOTAL: {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(tax.total,currency=doc.currency) }}
name: SI Form
